documentId: Understanding Arguments_ An Introduction to Informal Logic (1)
content:
g Venn diagrams, test the following syllogistic forms for validity:
1.  All Mis P.4.  All Pis M.
All Mis S.Some Mis S.
All Sis P.Some Sis P.
2.  All Pis M.5.  All Pis M.
All Mis S.Some Sis M.
All Sis P.Some Sis P.
3.  All Mis P.6.  All Pis M.
Some Mis S.Some Sis not M.
Some Sis P.Some Sis not P.
Exercise VII
